languageQuery:
SPARQL define output:format "JSON" 
SELECT DISTINCT ?code ?lang
 FROM <http://dataid.dbpedia.org/iso639-1/>
WHERE{
?l a <http://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/iso639-1/iso639-1_Language>.
?l <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#prefLabel> ?lang.
?l <http://www.loc.gov/mads/rdf/v1#code> ?code.
FILTER(lang(?lang) = "en")}
ORDER BY ?lang
